def_en: A jungle is a forest in a tropical country where large numbers of tall trees and plants grow very close together.

def_cn: 堆满东西的地方；杂乱无章的地方
def_en: If you describe a place as a jungle, you are emphasizing that it is full of lots of things and very untidy.

def_cn: 复杂困难的境况；尔虞我诈的环境
def_en: If you describe a situation as a jungle, you dislike it because it is complicated and difficult to get what you want from it.

def_cn: 丛林法则；弱肉强食的原则
def_en: If you refer to the law of the jungle, you are referring to a situation in which there are no laws or rules to govern the way that people behave and people use force to get what they want.

def_cn: 丛林音乐（一种有着快节奏鼓点的舞曲）
def_en: Jungle is a style of dance music with a fast drum beat.
